abstract: Canadian police announce they have thwarted plot by three suspects to kill people at mall in Halifax, Novia Scotia, on Valentine's Day before killing themselves; one suspect fatally shoots himself as police attempt to apprehend him, and other two are charged with conspiracy to murder; officials say case is not related to terrorism.
lead_paragraph: One suspect is said to have fatally shot himself on Friday, and two have been charged with conspiracy to commit murder.

headline.main: Canadian Police Say They Foiled a Plot by 3 Suspects to Kill People at a Halifax Mall
headline.print_headline: Canadian Police Say They Foiled a Plot by 3 Suspects to Kill People at a Halifax Mall

snippet: One suspect is said to have fatally shot himself on Friday, and two have been charged with conspiracy to commit murder.
